alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:24PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Benito County through 915 PM PDT... At 823 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles east of Ridgemark, or 19 miles east of Hollister, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central San Benito County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument
